page.title: 17THE OFFICE COMPLEX
page.content: The office complex is modern but blends in well with the surrounding Victorian buildings. The inside is very well planned with rooms leading into each other. Space is provided for hundreds of files and many large maps. This office controls 15,000 acres of farmland, gardens, parkland and forest, there are 300 employees to look after it. Modern technology plays a big part in the office. All the accounts are kept on a single computer but secretaries are still needed for answering letters and attending to general business. The office can keep in touch with the Park Wardens and farm laboures using a radio link up. This saves time and energy and helps the smooth running of the day.
